wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Alan Sircom (3 August 1934 – 11 June 2008) was an English writer, musician, musical director and composer.

response: Rowlands began her career in the chorus of Annie Get Your Gun, followed by a summer season in Torquay. She then spent several years with the Players' Theatre in London, before making her West End debut in Sandy Wilson's musical Valmouth. It was at this time she met her future husband, the composer Malcolm Sircom. They divorced in 1967.
